item.description:
@kingman002 wrote:

[quote=“Serravalle, post:2, topic:445981”]Under or above the welcome message/starter method add something like

getPA().showInterface(3559);
canChangeAppearance = true;[/quote]
That has nothing to do with it. Also it’s not a PI, I don’t like PI lol.

item.title: Character creator interface problem[317]
item.dc:creator: @kingman002 kingman002
item.description:
@kingman002 wrote:

I can’t seem to get the character creator interface (interface 3559) to fully work. The buttons work for changing how the character will look. And the accept button works but the character’s clothes, hair, ect don’t change (so it works but it doesn’t).

Accept button code:

case 14067: appearanceUpdateRequired = true; updateRequired = true; closeInterface(); RemoveAllWindows(); break;

Not sure what else to post. If there’s something else you need just ask.

Read full topic
